header.title: Erl_Interface Library Reference

description.p: The erl_interface library is a C interface library for communication with Erlang.

note.p: By default, the erl_interface library is only guaranteed to be compatible with other Erlang/OTP components from the same release as the erl_interface library. See the documentation of the erl_set_compat_rel() function on how to communicate with Erlang/OTP components from earlier releases.
